original: 曹丕稱尊號，改年黃初。其時傳聞漢獻帝被害，劉備乃於成都發喪制服，追諡曰孝愍皇帝。
text: Cao Pi was called the honorable title, changed to the beginning of Huang. At that time, it was rumored that Emperor Xian of the Han Dynasty was killed, and Liu Bei issued a funeral uniform in Chengdu, pursuing his posthumous title as Emperor Xiaomin.
